title: antsRegistrationSyNQuick.sh
description: A script to quickly compute a SyN-based registration between two images using ANTS.

output_transform.title: Output Transform
output_transform.description: Affine transformation matrix resulting from registration.

output_warp.title: Output Warp
output_warp.description: Warp field resulting from the registration.

output_inverse_warp.title: Output Inverse Warp
output_inverse_warp.description: Inverse warp field resulting from the registration.
